content:
# The move command executed successfully, confirming that I am now at the exact position of the stone patch.
# I will now attempt to place the stone furnace at this position.

# Now, I'll place the stone furnace to begin the smelting process.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(-14.5, -14.5))  # Place the stone furnace at the stone patch.
print(f'Furnace placed at: {furnace.position}')  # Confirming the placement of the furnace.
